https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/iEl4aURi7RBTQoPqmqVwu2hB10r.jpg Belém, northern Brazil, during the Círio de Nazaré. A miriti toy, fan of brega music, is rejected by his girlfrend. Looking for her, he lives some adventures in a miriti Belém, full of popular music and folklore. ADMIRIMIRITI
